reviews.title: Excellent eco-friendly floss!
reviews.review_body: I absolutely love this silk dental floss! It's such a great sustainable alternative to plastic floss. The peppermint flavor is refreshing and the floss feels strong and effective. The glass jar is beautiful and reusable. Highly recommend for anyone looking to reduce their plastic waste.

reviews.title: Good product but pricey
reviews.review_body: The silk floss works well and I like that it's biodegradable. The peppermint taste is nice and it doesn't break easily like some other eco floss I've tried. However, it is quite expensive compared to regular floss. Worth it for the environmental benefits though.

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.review_body: I was really excited to try this eco-friendly floss, but I'm disappointed. The floss breaks very easily and doesn't clean between my teeth as well as my regular floss. The container is nice but the product itself doesn't work well for me. Maybe it's just my teeth spacing but I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.title: Perfect zero waste solution!
reviews.review_body: This is exactly what I was looking for! The silk floss is strong, the peppermint flavor is perfect, and I love that it comes in a reusable glass jar. Great for my zero waste journey. The 90m length lasts a good amount of time too. Will definitely order again!

reviews.title: Terrible customer service and product
reviews.review_body: Worst purchase ever! The floss tastes weird, the jar arrived cracked, and customer service was completely unhelpful. When I contacted them about the damaged packaging, they were rude and refused to replace it. Save your money and buy something else. This company doesn't care about their customers at all.

title: Great Natural Product
review_body: Good quality natural shea butter at a reasonable price. Delivery was fast and the product arrived in perfect condition.

title: Decent Shea Butter
review_body: The shea butter is okay, but there are some minor issues. It works as expected but could be better.

title: Amazing Gift Set!
review_body: I love this eco-friendly body care set! The quality is exceptional and it has exceeded all my expectations.

title: Good Water Bottle
review_body: Solid insulated water bottle with good quality. Keeps drinks cold for hours. Would recommend to others.

title: Excellent product, highly recommend!
review_body: This menstrual cup with steriliser has been a game-changer for me. The cup is comfortable and the steriliser makes it so easy to keep clean. I love that it comes as a complete package. The steriliser is compact and perfect for travel. I've been using it for 3 months now and couldn't be happier with my purchase.

title: Great value for money
review_body: I was hesitant to try a menstrual cup but this set made it easy. The steriliser is a great addition and the instructions were clear. The cup fits well and is comfortable. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is that it took me a couple of cycles to get used to it, but that's normal for first-time users.

title: Perfect for beginners
review_body: As someone who was new to menstrual cups, this product exceeded my expectations. The steriliser is so convenient and the cup itself is very comfortable. I love that it's eco-friendly and saves money in the long run. The customer service was also excellent when I had questions about sizing.

title: Good but could be better
review_body: The product is decent and the steriliser works well. However, I found the cup a bit too firm for my preference. It's comfortable enough but I think I would prefer a softer material. The steriliser is definitely a plus point though.

title: Absolutely love it!
review_body: This is my second menstrual cup and it's by far the best one I've tried. The steriliser is genius - so much easier than boiling water. The cup is comfortable and I can wear it for 12 hours without any issues. Highly recommend to anyone considering making the switch!
